summary: This bill, the Learn and Serve America Reinvestment Act, provides a direct appropriation of funds for the Learn and Serve America program. It allocates $40 million annually, with specific usage guidelines, and funds for additional staff. The bill expands eligibility for the program to include local educational agencies and modifies award procedures. The bill also institutes rules for grant awards in fiscal year 2026 and beyond, including a reservation for the Bureau of Indian Affairs and a competitive grant process, mandating an annual report to Congress. Finally, it makes conforming and clerical amendments regarding the program.
